Tell me about yourself (in a job interview):
To be or not to be:
Browse the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Send us your review on Google Play Store.
What is English with Lidia Plus?
How can I use the app?
What are the benefits of using the app?
How can I report bugs or give feedback?
How can I learn more about the app or the developer?
How does the app handle my data privacy and security?
Who owns the music and voice in the audio lessons?
How often are new lessons added to the app?
Who is Lidia Melinte and what is her role in the app?
English with Lidia Plus is an app that helps you learn English by reading or listening to blog posts written by Lidia, an English teacher.
You can use the app without internet connection. You can choose to read the blog posts or play audio instead. You can also adjust the theme and settings according to your preferences.

The app can help you learn English with relaxing and easy to understand lessons for everyone. You can also improve your listening skills by playing audio. The app has adaptive themes and Material-You design for a better user experience.
You can report bugs on GitHub. You can also contact d4rk7355608@gmail.com for support, information, and requests. If you are happy with the app, please rate it 5 stars on Google Play.
You can visit the official website/blog of the app. You can also follow D4rK on various platforms such as Google Developers, XDA, YouTube, DeviantArt, GameJolt, Twitter, and GitHub.

The app does not share any data with third parties. The app may collect some data types such as app info and performance. The data is encrypted in transit but cannot be deleted. You can learn more about how developers declare sharing on Google Play.
Some music from the audio lessons belong to their respective owners and principal voice is from Lidia Melinte.
The app is updated regularly with new lessons and features. You can check the Google Play page for the latest updates or follow D4rK on social media for announcements.
Lidia Melinte, an English teacher, creates the lessons and narrates the audios in the app.
Bun gƒÉsit dragi prieteni. Azi, la ora de englezƒÉ vom √ÆnvƒÉ»õa cum sƒÉ avem un interview reu»ôit.

Bun gƒÉsit prieteni la lec»õia de englezƒÉ de la radio, sunt Lidia Melinte ghidul vostru printre cuvinte, expresii »ôi pu»õinƒÉ muzicƒÉ √Æn limba englezƒÉ, frumoasa limbƒÉ a lui William Shakespeare, dar »ôi a lui Freddy Mercury care spunea cƒÉ tot ceea ce a trebuit sƒÉ »ôtiu am auzit la radio.

Atunci c√¢nd vrƒÉbiile c√¢ntau minunat prin copaci totul era fericit. Noi eram veseli »ôi jucƒÉu»ôi. Dar‚Ä¶ ne-au trimis de acasƒÉ. Ne-au trimis‚Ä¶ la »ôcoalƒÉ they send me away and they thought me how to be sensible »ôi ne-au √ÆnvƒÉ»õat sƒÉ fim rezonabili responsible, logical, practical pentru cƒÉ a»ôa e lumea √Æn care urma sƒÉ trƒÉim nu-i a»ôa? Dar astƒÉzi este despre interview »ôi a»ôa este lumea interview-urilor practical, responsible, logical and we have to be sensible »ôi noi chiar trebuie sƒÉ fim de nƒÉdejde.

De fapt la un interview este despre cum sƒÉ te vinzi how to sell yourself spun exper»õii √Æn interview-uri. »òtiu cƒÉ sunƒÉ cinic cynical ca »ôi √Æn c√¢ntecul nostru. Dar chiar a»ôa »ôi este and we have to be dependable orice angajator are nevoie de oameni √Æn care sƒÉ aibƒÉ √Æncredere dependable, iar noi trebuie sƒÉ ne descriem c√¢t mai pozitiv putem. Partea bunƒÉ e cƒÉ orice CEO AgeO manager, orice director, orice angajator, orice meneger de personal, to»õi sunt »ôi ei oameni, iar noi trebuie sƒÉ avem √Æn minte sƒÉ le oferim cea mai bunƒÉ versiune a noastrƒÉ. Nu mai este destul sƒÉ spui cƒÉ e»ôti onest, hard working, confident, loyal, team player, responsible, sensible, amyrical, nu‚Ä¶ Acum trebuie s-o arƒÉ»õi. You have to show them you are responsible, dependable. But how? Pur »ôi simplu le rƒÉspunzi cu ceea ce vor sƒÉ audƒÉ la √Æntrebarea Tell me about yourself

So, tell me about yourself.

Le spunem povestea vie»õii noastre? So, you want me to tell you the story of my life? No! He does not want to hear you telling him the story of your life. Nu, pentru cƒÉ nu suntem Brad Pitt √Æn interview cu un vampir. Nu ne √ÆntreabƒÉ despre via»õa noastrƒÉ.. despre cƒÉ»õel, despre pƒÉrin»õi. It's not about your life story.

Your parents, your background and your dog's name...

No, it's not about this.

What kind of cat do you have. It is not about that. So, when people hear that question they think Oh, let me tell you my life story and 20 minutes into... you had not talk about anything important. So, what they actually asking this? What are you bringing to the table. So, from now on when you hear the question "Tell me about yourself" I want you to make a mental switch. That equals what value could you bring to the company.

What value could you bring to the company. Asta vor sƒÉ audƒÉ. Ce valoare aduci companiei. Ce probleme po»õi sƒÉ rezolvi. Problems can you solve to the company. Ce probleme rezolvi pentru companie. Asta este cheia numƒÉrul 1 pe care v-o aduc astƒÉzi The key number one.

Key number too‚Ä¶ Is to be your best self. Be yourself, of cure, be authentic but be the best version of yourself. Fii cea mai bunƒÉ versiune a ta la interviu. Probabil »ôi √Æn job, dar mai ales la interview trebuie sƒÉ arƒÉ»õi asta. De ce te potrive»ôti cu ei? Pentru cƒÉ la urma urmei to»õi angajatorii vor sƒÉ »ôtie douƒÉ lucruri.

1. DacƒÉ po»õi sƒÉ-»õi faci treaba bine. Can you do the job well? 
2. E»ôti tu alegerea corectƒÉ √Æn pozi»õia respectivƒÉ? Are you the right choice for the position? 
3. Are the 3 S. Sunt cei trei S. Succes, strength, situation. Le aduci povestea ta de succes, de putere »ôi de situa»õie. DacƒÉ e»ôti potrivit √Æn situa»õia respectivƒÉ.

Povestea de succes!!!

Povestea de succes, ne putem ajuta de cele 7 cuvinte de putere. VƒÉ voi da acele 7 cuvinte de putere.

Seven power words. Prin aceste cuvinte √Æi spune»õi Yes I can do the job! I am the right choice. Primul cuv√¢nt, I am responsible, or responsibility folosim expresii precum It was my responsibility to do this, c√¢nd vorbim de un job trecut. Pentru cƒÉ vom face un mic "background", o micƒÉ istorie a ceea ce am fƒÉcut √Ænainte. »òi spui: my responsibility was‚Ä¶, responsabilitatea mea era sƒÉ‚Ä¶ Prin asta arƒÉ»õi ce responsabil e»ôti tu, c√¢t de bine po»õi colabora, "Colaborate", este al doilea cuv√¢nt cheie. In my last job I colaborated with‚Ä¶ "Initiative", al treilea cuv√¢nt de putere. I took initiative, arƒÉtƒÉ cƒÉ fƒÉceai ceea ce trebuia sƒÉ faci, fƒÉrƒÉ ca nimeni sƒÉ »õi-o cearƒÉ. Okay, it was my initiative to do this‚Ä¶ and that‚Ä¶, la fel, "initiative" arƒÉtƒÉ cƒÉ de fapt aveai √Æncredere √Æn tine »ôi e»ôti un bun muncitor. You showself confidence and you are a hardworker for self. Alt cuv√¢nt de putere este "a rezolva" resolve. I resolve the situation when something happened. C√¢nd ceva s-a √Ænt√¢mplat. I resolve the situation that ant that and that and by doing that. Alt cuv√¢nt de putere este "lead". Chiar dacƒÉ nu ve»õi fi √Æntr-o situa»õie de manager sau de leaders, cuv√¢ntul "lead" I was leading, este un cuv√¢nt de putere. "Result" este un alt cuv√¢nt puternic my result was. And example este alt cuv√¢nt. Poate vom detalia data viitoare aceste cuvinte. Dar sƒÉ nu uitƒÉm de unde am pornit, de la a fi responsabil. Responsibility. And they told me how to be responsible, logical, practical, not clinical, right? Asta vor sƒÉ audƒÉ. Nu neapƒÉrat sƒÉ spunem prin cuvinte ca noi suntem responsabili, ci cƒÉ ne-am achitat »ôi ne achitƒÉm bine de job. I always follow trought wet I say and gonna go. I am dependable. I hold myself accountable. I take responsibility and do what need to be done. Este exact ceea ce vor sƒÉ audƒÉ cƒÉ faci ceea ce trebuie sƒÉ faci. You do what need to be done. Vor sƒÉ audƒÉ cƒÉ e»ôti √Æn controlul situa»õiei. I show self control. Nu √Æi judeci pe ceilal»õi, deci »ôtii sƒÉ colaborezi e»ôti un good player. Use good judgement. Te g√¢nde»ôti la consecin»õe I think about consecuences of my action. »òi responsabilitatea este your duty number 1. √émi √Ændeplinesc toate obliga»õiile morale. »òi chiar »ôi atunci c√¢nd gre»ôe»ôti, pentru cƒÉ √Æntotdeauna vƒÉ vor √Æntreba despre weaknesses. Weaknesses is the same subject pentru data viitoare avem "weaknesses". If I, dacƒÉ gre»ôe»ôti, if I mess up, it's something I always confess up. I confess, marturisesc. I will keep my head up and neber give up. It is my dudy. And responsibility to follow trought. A»ôa este datoria mea »ôi responsabilitatea sƒÉ reu»ôesc √Æn tot ceea ce fac »ôi sunt responsabil de asta. You can come to me, pute»õi conta pe mine. Acesta ar fi trebuit sƒÉ fie un c√¢ntec pentru copii, ne jucam pu»õin cu registrele, aceasta e ideea dragii mei, astƒÉzi v-am dat 3 chei despre cum sƒÉ facem fa»õƒÉ unui inteview »ôi sper cƒÉ v-am luat pu»õin din stresul pe care √Æl avem cu to»õii atucni c√¢nd stƒÉm pe scaun cu CV-ul nostru √Æn fa»õa cuiva care ne pune √ÆntrebƒÉri »ôi vrea sƒÉ »ôtie despre noi. Asta vrea sƒÉ audƒÉ despre noi, c√¢t de buni suntem »ôi cum ne √Ændeplinim datoriile √Æntotdeauna. C√¢t de minuna»õi regi ai paradisului suntem noi.

Vom continua data viitoare cu cƒÉlƒÉtoria noastrƒÉ √Æn tƒÉr√¢mul interview-urilor »ôi sƒÉ nu uitƒÉm sƒÉ fim √Æntotdeauna buni cu noi √Æn»ôine »ôi nu prea clinici √Æntr-o lume at√¢t de durƒÉ. Pentru cƒÉ la urma urmei trebuie sƒÉ »ôtim cine suntem »ôi doar noi singuri ne putem da rƒÉspunsul la aceastƒÉ √Æntrebare. Pentru cƒÉ la urma urmei voiam sƒÉ »ôtim cu to»õii cine suntem. Who I am? Iar rƒÉspunsul la aceastƒÉ √Æntrebare nu ni-l poate da niciun interview. Dar, orice interview ne poate ajuta sƒÉ »ôtim cine suntem noi cu adevƒÉrat. »òi poate √Æntr-o zi chiar vom afla.

My radio, my only friend to teenage nights de Freddy Mercury, c√¢ntƒÉ la √Ænceput. I sit alone and watch your light my only friend to teenage nights. Stau singur »ôi-»õi privesc lumina unicul meu prieten al nop»õilor mele de adolescent.

Bine√Æn»õeles putem asculta c√¢ntecul opt√¢nd »ôi pentru lyrics, versuri »ôi chiar vƒÉ rog sƒÉ face»ôi astfel, sƒÉ asculta»õi muzica √ÆmpreunƒÉ cu versurile, astfel ve-»õi √ÆnvƒÉ»õa at√¢t vizual c√¢t »ôi auditiv, dar subiectul de astƒÉzi este to be, I am, you are, he is, she is. Bine√Æn»õeles frumos exemplificat √Æntr-un c√¢ntecel de √Ænceput √Æn √ÆnvƒÉ»õarea limbii engleze.

I am here, eu sunt aici, you are there. »òi chiar a»ôa se √ÆntamplƒÉ, I am here, you are there, in England I'm here, in Romanian you are there, in England. He is happy? Who is happy? Somebody is happy. Cineva este fericit, he is happy. She is sad, altcineva este trist, ea este tristƒÉ, she is sad.

It is burning ceva poate sƒÉ ardƒÉ undeva, nu ne g√¢ndim, nu »ôtiu, o inimƒÉ, o pƒÉdure, din pƒÉcate. It is burning, it, pentru animale, obiecte, fenomene‚Ä¶ It.. It is burning, the world is turing. Toate acestea √Æn timp ce lumea se √Ænv√¢rte, the world is turning.

√én timp ce, we are people, noi suntem oameni, and they are plants, »ôi ele sunt plante.

He is blue, she is red, acestea douƒÉ fiind stƒÉri de spirit, verbul to be exprimƒÉ de asemenea stƒÉri de pirit.

DupƒÉ cum am vƒÉzut verbul to be poate exprima »ôi stƒÉri de spirit he is blue, she is red. Sunt aceste expresii folosind culorile din limba englezƒÉ, sunt foarte multe expresii care folosesc culorile, care de care mai colorate, flying colors. We like to learning English and finish the leason with flying colors cu succes, nu? White elephant, you know the expression, ceva scump »ôi nefolositor. A golden boy, a golden girl. Vreau √Ænceputul la he is blue, she is red, de la stari de spirit, cineva este trist, el este trist, he is blue, she is red, dar ea este furioasa. Blue, de asemenea este un cuv√¢nt care intrƒÉ √Æn foarte multe expresii. True blue, care √ÆnseamnƒÉ faithful, loial, credincios, once in a blue moon foarte rar, aproape niciodata‚Ä¶ Once in a blue moon, out at the blue, din senin, √Æn mod neasteptat, it's rained yesterday in Romania out at the blue. La noi nu ploua, sunt 40 de grade deci ar fi o minune sƒÉ plouƒÉ, chiar »ôi in out at the blue pe nea»ôteptate.

Mai existƒÉ bƒÉie»õii cu ochi alba»ôtrii, blue eyed boy, cu altƒÉ semnifica»õie dec√¢t cea care stƒÉ √Æn Rom√¢nia, bƒÉie»õi cu ochii alba»ôtrii. Aici se referƒÉ la oameni privilegia»õi. He's such a blue eyed boy. The manager always treats him as if he's special, deci cineva care prime»ôte un tratament special.

Mai existƒÉ »ôi boys in blue, sƒÉ nu confundƒÉm‚Ä¶ BƒÉie»õii √Æn albastru, adicƒÉ √Æn uniforme folositƒÉ pentru a descrie poli»õia britanicƒÉ datoritƒÉ culorii albastre a uniformei. I saw boys in blue on the street I think everything is OK. Am vƒÉzut poli»õia pe stradƒÉ, cred cƒÉ totul este OK.

Mai existƒÉ »ôi expresia blue color worker, muncitorii care presteazƒÉ munca fizicƒÉ, blue color worker, distinct de white color worker, de cei care presteazƒÉ munca la birou. Dar mai existƒÉ »ôi pink color, pentru femeile care, sunt secretare sau au munca de asistente, pink color related to jobs and secretarial work. Cu pink, ar fi pink elephants frumoasƒÉ expresie care aratƒÉ cƒÉ existƒÉ o halucina»õie undeva √Æn creierul nostru sau pink slip, o metaforƒÉ folositƒÉ pentru atunci c√¢nd cineva este concendiat, iar fired to received a pinks slip, n-am vrea sƒÉ se √Ænt√¢mple asta.

Ummm.. cu verde, verde √Æmi place foarte mult expresia have a green thumb de data aceasta nu am folosit I am, ci am folosit to have, have a green thumb, avea talent pentru grƒÉdinƒÉrit, I think I have a green thumb. I like flowers and I loved plant and take care of them.

Red, pentru exprimarea stƒÉrilor mai puternice. I see red, I become very angry! VƒÉd rosu √Ænaintea ochilor, I see red sau I am in the red. I am in red, I am in depth, √Æn datorii, am datorii. Red herring, o expresie folositƒÉ pentru ceva care ne distrage aten»õia, something unimportant that distract attention from the real issue. A red herring. I have something important to write but there is the red herring that disturbs me. Ceva care ne distrage. Red tape, birocra»õie, mai ales √Æn Rom√¢nia. I had to go to much red tape to open this company.

‚Ä¢ Added an FAQ section to the app.

 ‚Ä¢ Added update notifications to inform users of new content and features.

 ‚Ä¢ Added welcome back notifications to greet returning users.

 ‚Ä¢ Added an exit dialog to confirm the user's intention to leave the app.

 ‚Ä¢ Added in-app updates to allow users to easily update the app without going through the Play Store.

 ‚Ä¢ Added a new setting for notifications.

 ‚Ä¢ Added a scroll view to the "More apps" dialog for easier navigation.

 ‚Ä¢ Added app updater dialog and ability to update in background.

 ‚Ä¢ Added language support for Bulgarian, French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Spanish, Russian, Swedish, Turkish and Ukrainian.

 ‚Ä¢ Enhanced project structure for better readability and maintainability.

 ‚Ä¢ Reworked and improved animations.

 ‚Ä¢ Fixed all crash reports from Google Play Console and Google Firebase.

 ‚Ä¢ Improved readability, consistency, app performance, and responsiveness by optimizing and styling the outdated code.

 ‚Ä¢ Made various under-the-hood improvements for a better overall app experience.
